attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:

In regards to the proposed rate increase for fees associated to international
adoption, I would like to provide for you from the standpoint of an adoptive parent,
the hardships that rate increases will incur upon myself and others in my position.
The cost of international adoption is already extremely high and quite a hardship
on those in the process. We have not only had to pay these fees once, but now
twice due to the increased wait time that we have experienced. I understand that
the increase in wait time is not due to our government or your agency, but the fact
of the matter is that it continues to increase. We have had to have our home
study updated, our fingerprints re-taken and to file an additional I-600A, which have
each increased our costs significantly. An additional increase in processing fees
would cause a major hardship on hardworking families who simply want to expand
their families and provide a home to an orphan. Please take my comments along
with the others which you have received and reconsider the increases in fees that
have been proposed. I thank you for your time and consideration.

Respectfully,
Nikki L. Walsh

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Nikki L. Walsh
